properties.displayName: Azure Diagnostics Policy Initiative for a Log Analytics EventHub and AzDefender
properties.description: This initiative configures application Azure resources to forward diagnostic logs and metrics to an Azure Diagnostics sink point.

metadata.description: The target Log Analytics Workspace for Azure Diagnostics
